caption.center: ERNEST JOSEPH GINGRAS v. ALVIN G. RICHMOND et al.

opinion.posture: Motion of plaintiff-appellant to assign for argument is granted and matter assigned to continuous argument list. Joslin, J. not participating.
opinion.attorneys:
Aram K. Berberian, for plaintiff.
Louis A. Mascia, City Solicitor, Ronald H. Glantz, Deputy City Solicitor, for defendants.Page 936
